name: Apple Provision Profile
summary: Learn about .PROVISIONPROFILE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Mobile developers should create a provisioning profile for their application. Users can ensure they are getting the application they want by using an application that's digitally signed and has a provision profile.
NOTE: As of iOS 8 Apple iPhone Configuration Utility is no longer available.

description: Provision file created and used to distribute applications to iOS devices not through Apple's App Store; contains a certificate and the information for the device and application necessary to install an enterprise application on an iOS machine.
